Andriëtte Norman, onye na-arụkarị ọrụ dị ka Andriëtte, bụ onye Afrikaner na-abụ abụ si na mpaghara Cape Town Brackenfell.

N'afọ 2007, Andriëtte bụ onye nke abụọ na oge nke anọ nke Idols South Africa, ma wepụta otu egwu site na ihe ngosi ahụ ("Love Is All Around"). O wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Diamant, na 2008, Dink Aan My (2009), Vat My Hoër (2011), Wat Rym Met Liefde (2013), na Pêrel vir 'n Kroon (2015).
